code: import React,{createContext,useState,useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const UserContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const useUser=()=>{return useContext(UserContext);};export const UserProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const login=(role,profile)=>{setUser({role,profile});};const logout=()=>{setUser(null);navigate("/");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserContext.Provider,{value:{user,login,logout},children:children});};export default UserProvider;
